SEARCH

Class chest

java.lang.Object
chest
public class chest extends Object
This class represents the chests in our dungeon game. It has each type of item and generates a random one if a chest is opened.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    call()
    Updates players inventory with new items from chest.
    static void
    newChest(boolean chest)
    If the room you moved to has a chest (labeled 'c' for chest in dungeon) AND you have not exceeded inventory limit, it will prompt message for if you would like to open the chest.
    static void
    openChest()
    Opens chest, randomly generates one of the 5 items available for player, and stores it in their inventory.

      public chest()

  • Method Details

    • newChest

      public static void newChest(boolean chest)
      If the room you moved to has a chest (labeled 'c' for chest in dungeon) AND you have not exceeded inventory limit, it will prompt message for if you would like to open the chest.
      Parameters:
      chest - true if you move to a room/spot in the dungeon that marks 'c' for a chest, false otherwise.

    • call

      public static void call()
      Updates players inventory with new items from chest.

    • openChest

      public static void openChest()
      Opens chest, randomly generates one of the 5 items available for player, and stores it in their inventory.
